StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetNumberofInterviews]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID integer, @BeginDate date.me, @EndDate date.me = NULL, @Interviews integer OUTPUT AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @MonthsInDateRange int
SELECT @EndDate = COALESCE(@EndDate, @BeginDate)
SELECT @MonthsInDateRange = DATEDIFF(MONTH, @BeginDate, @EndDate)
SELECT * INTO #ORGS FROM dbo.GetOrgHierarchy (@Organiza.onID)
SELECT @Interviews = SUM(RA.TC_INTERVIEWS + RA.OT_INTERVIEWS + RA.AC_INTERVIEWS + RA.HV_INTERVIEWS) FROM #ORGS O INNER JOIN RSS_ACTIVITY RA ON (O.ORG_ID = RA.ORGANIZATION_ID AND O.ORG_TYPE = 'RSS' AND DATEDIFF(MONTH, RA.ACTIVITY_DATE, @BeginDate) BETWEEN 1 - @MonthsInDateRange AND 3)
--- CLEAN UP DROP TABLE #ORGS SET NOCOUNT OFF
